title: Severe Weather
text: ALERT! Severe Weather expected within 30 minutes. For the safety of all Guest & Staff we will be shutting down [STAGE NAME] while the weather passes.

title: Stage Evacuation
text: ALERT! A Stage Evacuation has been issues for [STAGE NAME]. Please follow staff instructions while we work to safely reopen the stage.

title: Camp Showers Down
text: The camping showers are temporarily closed due to cleaning or maintenance. We hope to reopen them as soon as possible. Additional showers may be opera.

title: Camp Area Closure
text: CAMP ALERT! The [CAMP AREA NAME] and its amenities will be temporarily closed while we resolve an issue. Please use the facilities at Camp Center.
